oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With this is bound: Adʻīyah manqūlah min kalām Abī al-Ḥasan al-Ḥusaynī al-Shadhīlī (ff. 20r-22v) -- Ḥizb al-baḥr / li-al-Shādhīlī (ff. 23r-24r) -- Tiryāq al-muḥibbīn fī sīrat sulṭān al-ʻārifīn Muḥyī al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn al-Rifāʻī / li-Taqī al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd al-Muḥsin al-Wasīṭī al-Anṣārī (ff. 26r-37v).
MS Arab 362. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
